# Hydrolix Exporter

<!-- end autogenerated section -->

Exports telemetry data to Hydrolix, a cloud-native data platform designed for high-volume observability data.

## Configuration

The following settings are required:

- `endpoint` (no default): The Hydrolix server endpoint URL.
- `table` (no default): The Hydrolix table name where data will be written.

The following settings are optional:

- `timeout` (default: 30s): HTTP request timeout.
- `headers` (no default): Additional HTTP headers to include in requests.
- `auth` (no default): Authentication configuration.
  - `authenticator` (no default): The name of the authenticator extension to use for authentication.

## Example

```yaml
exporters:
  hydrolix:
    endpoint: https://my-hydrolix-instance.example.com
    table: my_table
    timeout: 30s
    auth:
      authenticator: basicauth/hydrolix
```
